      this method get purchased coupons by price for customer

      this method get purchased coupons by type for customer
      void AdminFacade.removeCompany(Company company)
      this method remove company with all coupons first delete coupons from customer-coupon table, second delete coupons from coupon table third delete coupons from company-coupon table and finally delete the company itself
      void CompanyFacade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      this method remove coupon for company first check if coupon belong to company then remove the coupon from customer-coupon and company-coupon tables then remove the coupon itself
      void AdminFacade.removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      this method remove customer from customer and customer-coupon tables
      void AdminFacade.updateCompany(Company company)
      this method update company, only password and email
      void CompanyFacade.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      this method update coupon only for end-date and price
      void AdminFacade.updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      this method update customer, can update only password
